ComicInfo.Title: The Freedom Divide
ComicInfo.Summary:
The best-selling Aspen series from creator Siya Oum continues!
Lola's plan to recruit the services of the Cannibals to fight against the Suits may have backfired severely, as all the groups in The Wasteland make their motives violently clear-and no one is safe in their wake!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Market Cover A | Siya Oum | 1 | B | Direct Market Cover B | Martin Abel | 2 | C | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Edition Cover | Siya Oum | 3 | D | AspenStore.com Black Friday Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Siya Oum | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-07 21:10:09. [CVDB643150]
